actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-350.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 10, a bill to restore to Federal civilian and Postal Service employees their rights to participate voluntarily, as private citizens, in the political processes of the Nation, to protect such employees from improper political solicitations.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 10 (Federal employees' political activities).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H. R. 10, a bill to restore to Federal civilian and Postal Service employees their rights to participate voluntarily, as private citizens, in the political processes of the Nation, to protect such employees from improper political solicitations.
